Source code for itv_asset_tree.utils.logger

import logging
import sys
from pathlib import Path

# Ensure logs directory exists
LOGS_DIR = Path(__file__).parent.parent / "logs"
LOGS_DIR.mkdir(exist_ok=True)

# Set up logging configuration
LOG_FILE_PATH = LOGS_DIR / "app.log"

logging.basicConfig(
    level=logging.INFO,  # Default log level
    format="%(asctime)s [%(levelname)s] %(message)s",
    handlers=[
        logging.FileHandler(LOG_FILE_PATH),  # Save logs to file
        logging.StreamHandler(sys.stdout),   # Print logs to console
    ],
)

# Create logger instance
logger = logging.getLogger("itv_asset_tree")



[docs]
def log_info(message: str):
    """
    Logs an informational message.
    
    Args:
        message (str): The message to be logged.
    """
    logger.info(message)





[docs]
def log_warning(message: str):
    """
    Logs a warning message.
    
    Args:
        message (str): The warning message to be logged.
    """
    logger.warning(message)





[docs]
def log_error(message: str):
    """
    Logs an error message.
    
    Args:
        message (str): The error message to be logged.
    """
    logger.error(message)





[docs]
def log_debug(message: str):
    """
    Logs a debug message (useful for development).
    
    Args:
        message (str): The debug message to be logged.
    """
    logger.debug(message)
